place_description: Modern redbrick brewery with a rotating selection of draft and to-go beers, plus a beer garden.

reviews_data.review_text: I'm not really a drinker, so I honestly can't speak to the beer, but I can tell you that everyone I know loves to go here and the atmosphere is really nice. It's a cool place to hangout and have great conversations with friends. Very popular place as well.

Amazing place! Came by here on a random Tuesday night, the place was packed for a pub-quiz but luckily still had space for us outside, and we loved the cider and the atmosphere! Also, the merch is really cute :)
Mexican lager was nice and refreshing on a hot day!
My girlfriend and I love this place. Great beers and great vibes. Highly recommend!!
Very nice brewery, fun staff, and great beer!
Nice stop before a show. Train line a few feet away.

Disappointing beer. Sours taste like vinegar. Good morning Vietnam was a good brew. IPAs are okay and everything else is just below average. Environment is great, but do not come here if you are looking for unique or above average craft beer.
Great beer and great food
Hit the coffee shop, was excellent
Great location

The burger was  and the beer was pretty good too! Loved all the open space (indoor and out). This is definitely not just reheated bar food, the fries were also amazing. Would definitely go back to try more things!!
Good beer, cool hang out.  Worth a visit.
Great selection and nice atmosphere. Only complaint would be the music was a little loud initially to have conversations.
Had a couple of beers  with my son on our way to the baseball

Seems like a cool place and the beer I had was tasty. My wife really enjoyed the cider she tried as well. However when we initially walked up the menu board only had maybe 15 items on it and almost half of them were marked as sold out. So the selection felt really limited which was very disappointing.

The atmosphere was good, they were just spinning up a trivia night as we left so people were there having a good time and I could definitely see this being a good regular hangout location

Would love to try them again when they have a better handle on their draft list.
Best beer ever and the nicest people ever too
Delicious beers and great atmosphere and always great service. It can get very crowded so be aware. I've never had a bad experience here
Very cool brewery with plenty of outdoor seating, lots of beer options, and friendly staff!
Good service, good beer.

Stopped by here based solely on the fact that it was a Saturday at 9:00am and they offered coffee, beer, and breakfast. They nailed it on all three options! I had the Red Eye with the in-house made cinnamon and brown sugar syrup (amazing) and a red sour beer (also amazing if you like sours). For breakfast I had a sausage egg and cheese sandwich, and a chorizo and egg empanada, both of which were perfect. I followed it up with their delicious stout (which I added an espresso shot to after tasting, it's the breakfast of champions). Staff was friendly, funny, and awesome.
Good beer and great burgers

The beer and food are great, but a lot of breweries in Charlotte have great beer and food.  The thing that makes Wooden Robot so nice is how genuinely friendly the staff is.  The bartenders always seems so happy to be there, and happy to be serving you.  Never pushy, never impatient, always helpful.  It's a great place to spend some time.

Wooden Robot Brewery is a sanctuary for beer aficionados and coffee connoisseurs alike, nestled in the heart of Charlotte, NC. Their diverse selection of craft brews tantalizes the taste buds with each sip, showcasing a blend of innovation and tradition that sets them apart. From crisp IPAs to rich stouts, their brews cater to every palate, inviting patrons on a flavorful journey through the art of brewing.

But it's not just about the beer; Wooden Robot also boasts a curated selection of craft coffees, perfect for those seeking a midday pick-me-up or a leisurely sip with friends. Each cup is meticulously brewed to perfection, delivering a robust and aromatic experience that elevates the senses.

Pair your beverage of choice with their delectable bar food offerings, ranging from classic pub fare to inventive small plates. Whether you're craving a juicy burger or artisanal charcuterie, their menu satisfies every craving, leaving you fully satisfied and craving more.

However, what truly sets Wooden Robot apart is its exceptional team of employees. Friendly, knowledgeable, and passionate about their craft, they embody the spirit of hospitality, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for all who walk through the door. Their genuine enthusiasm for the brewery's offerings and dedication to providing top-notch service ensure that every visit is memorable.

In sum, Wooden Robot Brewery isn't just a place to grab a drink or a bite to eat--it's an embodiment of Charlotte's vibrant and eclectic culture. Through its outstanding brews, craft coffee, delicious food, and exceptional staff, it offers a glimpse into the soul of the city, where creativity, community, and good times come together in perfect harmony.

I'm a visitor from CT and I love this place!
Since I had to be gluten free, I can enjoy beer again!

Great beer tenders, knowledgeable and friendly.  Diverse selection of beers, all done very well.  Deepest condolences to Dan's family, friends, and the CLT beer community. Speaking as a beer industry worker visiting from out of town, please support these folks.  They do a great job.

Welcoming atmosphere for any craft beer enthusiast. Enjoy a beer inside or outside. Watch sporting events or enjoy a game of bags or pinball. Even when they are busy, the staff works diligently to serve you with friendliness and passion

Need a 4.75 star rating. Came here to hang out for a bit. Had the pretzels and a flight. The neer cheese and pretzels are legit. All the beers were good, not great. Really enjoyed Good Morning Vietnam, my favorite of the 5 I had in the flight. Cool vibe and great place to just relax.
Great atmosphere, great service, great beer, Best Damn Cheeseburger I've EVER HAD!
Hands down, best Fried Chicken Sandwich in Charlotte!!!!! Axios, get on this....
Love,love, love awesome spot. The coffee side is super chill where the other side was loud and crowded. Grade prices in the tasting glasses are super cute. Definitely recommend.

I got the prickle my fancy which is a prickly pear sour and it was very good my husband got the dancing robot which is a 7% ABV IPA, it smells amazing and the flavor is really good for people who like IPAs. There is a really nice atmosphere and we enjoyed being able to see some of the work being done in the brewery. It's a raining Friday around lunch time and it is not too busy. Very nice place
Best brewery in Charlotte
Great little brewery. Food, beer, service, and vibe were excellent! Will definitely be back some day!
Our favorite craft beer tap room in Charlotte.

Everyone who worked today (2/7/24) from like 3:55-4:10 was literally an angel and should get a raise. I love wooden robot but their team today took customer service to a whole new level. I want to kiss every one of them on the forehead. They could not have been nicer to me and my dog.

Wooden Robot knows how to grow well. Been coming here since 2019 when they were just a brewery. Their coffee shop is excellent and their food is a really well-planned menu that makes a strong addition to their offerings. I love that they have gf options since their beer is technically gf (less than 15 ppm- celiac delight!). This place just does a good job at everything. Yeah they get crowded, but it's for a reason.
Great vibe, great bartenders, merch is on point, beer was fantastic (mocha coffee vanilla something)

Great location, nice outdoor area. A delicious Pops Pilsner. Their non-alcoholic options are tasty too. The pretzels came with a great coarse mustard and the hummus was different and sweet in a way that tickles the taste buds. I'll go here again!
Bartender was helpful with making a decision

Cool vibe...engaging, knowledgeable staff & delicious beer!  My husband is an IPA guy & he loved & highly recommends the Space Magic Hazy IPA!!
We enjoyed some Smokey Parm
Wings too...flavour was great...we just wish they were a tad crispier!!
We will definitely return!
BUSSIN chicken sandwich. Thank you
Amazing staff give walker a raise he's awesome-   Great service-   And smiling and happy to be here!
Staff is attentive and friendly. Love this brewery!
Great beers
I was in town visiting a family member, we stopped in for a couple of beers. The beer is great. Amazing atmosphere and the staff were super friendly and fun. I will definitely return.
Good beer, good people.
This is a great place to spend the afternoon with your loved ones and friends. It was our first time visiting Wooden Robot and TJ made us feel like we were locals.
Great spot with lots of indoor/outdoor seating. Coffee shop, expansive selection of craft beers, solid food menu. Friendly service. Large group seating and lots of TVs for sports.

Y'all. This place is ah-maz-ing!!!!!

It's got such a fun, funky vibe. The music playing makes morning feel like a mood you can get behind. The coffee is crafted and incredible. It's absolutely an art. As an added bonus, if you love disc golf, Tyler behind the counter is a great conversation.

Beer for breakfast? No problem. This place has everything. All gluten free beer, and two craft ciders brewed in house. The seasonal selections are definitely in the DO NOT MISS category.

The brunch menu slaps. The owner's wife is a Celiac so we have options here!!

Come for the coffee, stay for vibe.
Real great location, great coffee, great beer and good food.

Nice spot, tasteful ambiance. Beer is good but not great, covenient that they have a proper espresso bar on site that looked good, but I didn't get to try it. Service isn't warm but they're also not rude and they get the job done. I would come back again.

Met some coworkers for a birthday lunch. I'm not a huge beer drinker, but they do have wine options available which was absolutely wonderful! I know, why go to a brewery if you aren't drinking any brews? However, the Chardonnay was perfect and complimented my Chicken Caesar wrap and sweet potato fries nicely. You do have to go to the bar to get your drinks, as well as, order food. You will be given a table top number so that the server can find you with your order. This location is tucked away and has an open patio as well as indoor seating. Pups are welcome, so feel free to bring your fur babies because they are welcome, too!
Great atmosphere & space. Very nice range of styles & solid brews. Super friendly service & tasty food options as well. Definitely recommend!
Nice brewery with a varied selection, including N/A, and good food
Great brewery.  Love the low key vibe!
Joe was fantastic!! Very knowledgeable and friendly! Great beer, great people, great fun!!
Cool spot with a hipster vibe. Iced chai tea with oatmilk is honey is fabulous.
Ryan and the rest of the staff were awesome.

Excellent. A lot of times you hit a small brewery and the beer is kind of taste the same. Not so with Wooden Robot.

I lean into IPAs. Everyone was different. Everyone was on point. From a California East Coast mixture through their NEIPA all unique, all very tasty.

Bless this brury, it's easily my second favorite as far as the independents go. They have a spectacular kitchen, and their signature Good Morning Vietnam is THE MOST delicious blonde ale you're likely to find in town. Stop reading and go! It's fantastic!
Great food and beer.
If you are coming to Charlotte and you Google "best breweries in town" , this is the spot you're looking for!
Exceptional coffee surpasses Starbucks!
Sold location and venue but after trying a flight of 5 separate beers they all basically tasted the same. Lacking variety.

Wooden Robot is a decent brewery in NoDa, Charlotte with an extensive collection of beers and ciders. We visited on a Tuesday evening and it was understandably not busy.

We got the Space Magic IPA and the hard seltzer. Space Magic tasted much akin to a smooth, hazy IPA, and the seltzer was nice as well. The taco food truck outside complemented the drinks well.

They've seating both outside and inside as well as a rooftop. It's located right next to the train station. The server was polite and we made small talk with her for a bit. Parking nearby can be a challenge--the garage right next to the brewery is free for the first 30 mins.

Overall, it's a decent brewery in NoDa to have a fun time.

This Wooden Robot, like The Chamber location, is hit or miss. Either their beers are on point and have a flavor - or they don't. And then they don't, they don't.
Music is generally obnoxiously blasting and hard to sit down and have a conversation with the folks you're with.
I've only visited for the coffee bar during the week and weekend. The staff are amazing with my dogs and the drinks are great. I have a custom cappuccino request and they remember it!

I'm not from Charlotte and live about 3000 miles away.  One week on, I'm still thinking about the awesome fried chicken sandwich. It was distinctive, cooked perfectly and came in an excellent delicious bun.  The garnish, while simple and straightforward, did not complicate the taste of the sandwich.  Any more would have ruined the balance. I was  trying to think of a better chicken sandwich I might have had before but couldn't think of one.  Their beer is great too.  My wife prefers hard seltzer to beer.  Hers was the best I've ever tried.  Bartender was friendly and cool.  And I love dogs, of which there were many hanging out.  This place is awesome and should be frequented regularly by those lucky enough to live close by.
Love the brewery and the beer, but parking is a nightmare
Come here when I venture down to Charlotte.. Great beer and the Fried Chicken sandwich cannot be topped... Dog friendly too!

Blown away. Great on all the styles. Czech pilsner was perfect for the style. Solid IPAs but their farmhouse beers have a great depth of flavor and are amazing.. Great staff and great atmosphere. They know their stuff.
Decent beer, bartender was great. Used to New England IPAs so these hazy's were different, not bad but different
I really loved their beers on tap. Enjoyed a flight and also had the Wing Wednesdays which is a pretty good deal (8 wings with celery and half fries for $10).

Tasty beers. Laid back vibe. Lovely Staff. Nice selection of Sours. Pet friendly patio.

I seldom drink beer anymore because of the way it makes me feel afterwards (bloated, headache, achy joints, etc.).

However, Wooden Robot is the exception. I have never had any adverse effects after drinking their beer. It is my #1 choice when hanging out in CLT for a pub crawl with friends.

Lindsey and Brett are the main reasons I come to Wooden. Excellent customer service and make us feel like home. I've been the to so many breweries and this one is the hands down the best. The best beer in town as well!
Little known fact; the beer has gluten free enzymes which makes a great choice for those with gluten allergies. The food is delicious and the atmosphere is even better.
Huge space.  Good beer.  Great vibes!
Great beers and nice experience
Enjoyed their food and Tuesday night trivia. The fries were delicious!

Came here all the way from Texas, the beers are amazing, the service was awesome gave us very generous samples to try the different beers, and the vibe of the place is really awesome, if you are thinking about coming here, do it, you won't regret it.
Stopped by while visiting town on Sunday at noon. Not too busy, light and airy atmosphere. Solid iced lavender honey vanilla latte. Would visit again!
The place was really cute. We got a flight and while the beers were all ok, I didn't love any of them. I would still go back and try something else though.
Great beer and dog friendly patio!
Great spot.  Always good beer and good place to hang out.
Good beer and nice atmosphere. Been there for some really good coffee as well.
Absolutely one of my favorite breweries in CLT!  The cooliest & coziest taproom plus great, friendly bar staff (TJ rocks!!!). Happy drinking!
Beer and food are excellent. Staff is attentive and kind when the busyness of the business gets in the way. I'll absolutely be back.

One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte (and best logo)! I'm currently not drinking and when I went a few nights ago I was very impressed with the NA beers they had on hand!! It's hard to find breweries that provide NA beer options.
Great food, awesome beer and friendly staff. Highly recommend.

Honestly surprised. I know they're known to own a brewery so I didn't know what to expect with the coffee shop.

The scenery was still bar looking. They had food options there which was a surprise. I ordered an Americano. It came out so odd looking but it was smooth and delicious. I'll bring friends here next time.

Went today around 1115 and only the coffee shop side was open at that time.  Sat at the bar for a flight and a pretzel. Service was terrible!! I was never greeted and had to as the bar tender for assistance to get a flight and later to get my check.  She was terribly inattentive! Hopefully the brewery side is better.  Had a flight and a pretzel.  I really enjoyed the Brain Drizzle IPA and the pretzel was on point - soft and buttery. I wasn't a fan of the mustard or cheese. The cheese was very peppery tasting.
It was fine. the main bar wasn't open but sat in the coffee lounge. Beer and food was good
Wonderful place that has some great beer and food. The staff was super friendly even after they had made a minor mistake on our order.  I would recommend the pretzels and the bao buns.
Coffee and beer under the same roof. It doesn't get much better than that. Very friendly staff, good atmosphere, just amazing.
I would definitely skip the food but there is a fun and friendly atmosphere and I love that they also serve coffee.
Great brewery and coffee shop. Staff was friendly and atmosphere was nice
Good Morning Vietnam never disappoints!! Great place to have a drink before a Charlotte FC game!
Good location and beer with nice outdoor sitting
Very  dog friendly place and staff - really enjoyed the options that included wine and craft NA beer and seltzers for my prego wife
Beer is exceptional, service is a delight & the art is so fun! The patio is stunning & the music is 10/10 would recommend.
Great beers and service!  One of my favorite Charlotte breweries.
Great vibes
Highly recommend! Staff is so friendly, and great atmosphere!
Great spot to hangout. Stafff is super clean, drinks are great, and the place is very clean.
Best beer in Charlotte
Good beers good service !
My new favorite brewery in Charlotte. The beer selection is great and the food is surprisingly good.

Great selection of beers, always have new ones on the menu. The new kitchen/food is also very delicious. A little pricey for only a sandwich that doesn't come with toppings & is extra. But honestly the food & beer you can't beat. I also LOVE their coffee bar. We all know Charlotte has a million coffee shops, but out of all of them, this one is by far my favorite coffee.
Good selection of beer, both indoor and outdoor seating!

Great brewery to bring friends from out of town! Good variety of choices for every palate and their food menu was recently revamped.

Super dog friendly and great customer service.
Great Beer!!! Amazing Food and the staff is off the charts fun

I love this place. Staff are so friendly and know their beer. Love the outside patio and it's a great place to bring your dog. They have big bowls of water for dogs there. The food is yummy too. I recommend the pretzels and sweet potato fries. The beer is so good and great selection!
Fun, good food and drinks
Chillin in the Charlotte cold with the family.  Great atmosphere!

Great brewery venue on Charlotte's South End. Great variety of brews and nice food menu options. Bartenders were friendly and hardworking. Kept things clean and smooth on a busy Saturday night. Loved it!
We stopped in with The Funny Bus Christmas light tour and so enjoyed it! The Florida Seltzer was so good!
Awesome beer and bartenders !! Ordered food, a burger  not cheap came with nothing, no fries, no side, no pickle  I mean absolutely nothing, not impressed, not right!!
Good food and great selection on draft

Went here Saturday night around 7. It was very busy but we were served quickly at the bar. We found a seat and our food was delivered pretty quickly.
The food was good, staff friendly, and there was ample seating.
Great atmosphere and great servers

Awesome brewery! I had the prickly pear sour and it was DELICIOUS! I'm a big sour beer fan. The pretzels and chicken sandwich were fantastic as well. This was an awesome dog friendly spot to grab some grub, drink some brews, and catch both college football games as well as some World Cup matches. Would definitely come back again
This is my favorite brewery in Charlotte! Keep Pounding.

Well loved Charlotte brewery with expansive inside and outside seating and a lineup of fabulous beers. Some snacks available too. Inside and covered patio has TVs showing sports. Despite the crowds on weekends service isn't slow!
The beer, great staff, great atmosphere.  What more can you say!
Great place with amazing service and plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Went there to get a coffee and enjoyed the large selection and brewery atmosphere.
Joe G on trivia!!

This place was suggested by our waiter from the pub Ri Ra,  he sent us to the north side but because google walking maps sent us south we landed here. The gentleman behind the counter asked me specific questions regarding "my go to beer flavors", and thus came up with the winners in a flight that was quite enjoyable and spot on. Truth be told he comped me an extra because he said he liked me. That is true customer service right there, and that beer was my favorite, took one to go AND bought and awesome button down shirt for my hubby. Long story short , My experience with both locations was positive and for those that may have been apart of my experience will be happy to know that the 2X shirt ended up fitting!!! (My husband wears an xl , be sure to check the fit out before just buying your normal size-)
Thanks to the guy with the black hat and the guy checking in the back
Great atmosphere and even greater beer.  They actually had curry ketchup which was super delicious with my French fries.  Going back again today.

This is for the FOOD only, the beer is great! But I don't know how a burger can be both dry AF and greasy? The bacon jam is basically just bacon crumble, it seems like they are relying on that in lieu of any condiment. I had to ask for mayo, ( they have sauces for fries so this was confusing) I got some helmanns packets tossed at me.
10/10, you'll have a blast. Shout out to Ashley

This place was awesome. Tried a handful of their beers, Fruits of Crime, Cucumber Cooler, Power Synapse, & What He's having, all fantastic.

Their chicken sandwich was tremendous, great breading, some unexpected spice and then their burger was phenomenal too. Clearly a high quality beef, seasoned well, and incredibly tasty. Can't wait to go back.
Great beer choices, good location, spacious inside, and an outdoor covered patio. Definitely going back.
Great beer and wings were

This was a good place to hangout, they have nice outdoor seating with roof and plenty of beer options and decent food menu. We went to the place just before their kitchen closing time but not the brewery, we ordered sambal wings which is their garlic pepper sauce and the brat dumplings. We received buffalo wings instead of the sambal wings. I didn't really mind since it was very late but the wings itself were chewy. Dumplings were okay. We also couple of beers psychic dynamite (west coast ipa) beer and it was very good and another one called old world. I think this was a barrel aged ipa and it had a unique taste and I personally wasn't a fan of it.
Fantastic beer and wings! Beer was so good that I almost forgot to take a photo of it for this review lol
Walker is the best!!! Seriously the best bartender I've ever encountered. He was very kind and helpful. :)

Beer was great and the different styles satisfied my party's varied tastes. Food was tasty without any imperfections. Walker was good to us and shared all his beer knowledge and plenty of little samples so we could make educated decisions. If I was a local I'd be a regular.
Staff was very friendly, but not a fan of the beer or the smell of the place. The mixture of coffee and beer being sold inside probably didn't help, but the beer was not great for me.
The beers are great. Liked all that I tried. The Staff is great! A must try for beer lovers!!

Went here thinking they were open fue to their hours posted.
They were actually closed and did not open till 12:00 noon one guy was rude and cussed us out
Amazing selection and great location
Nice brewery. Charges for stickers
Awesome vibe with plenty of indoor and outdoor seating. Great beer and the soft pretzels are delish!
Super nice staff and great beers! Really good atmosphere as well.
Its has really good beers. And service is awesome

Wooden Robot Brewery is a great place to grab a drink and chill with your friends. I went for the first time for my friend's 21st and was not dissapointed. The vibe and atmosphere was very nice and they had a wide variety of drinks on tap. I got the Wulong Tang drink which was pretty good. I wish they had ciders but they have a drink for everyone. I enjoyed sitting on the rooftop and enjoying the views of noda with my friends. Highly recommend if you're in the area!
In Charlotte for the first time with my husband. Wooden Robot was 12/10 for coffee and beer!
Beer is phenomenal, and new space is incredible.

Great brewery! The place was huge. It had an outdoor patio as well as plenty of indoor seating. The food selection was great, had lots of beer choices, and the service was fast, friendly, and just made the experience awesome. I would highly recommend this place if you're looking for a place to eat or just hang out.
Busy busy busy but a nice place overall

Go for the beer and stay for the food! The new kitchen at the Southend location is AMAZING. Best fried chicken sandwich ever (move over Chick fil A) and the curry ketchup for the fries is the only way to eat ketchup from here on out.
Great place great beer
Great OG of the charlotte beer scene. Nice space, good food, and the Good Morning Vietnam is amazing and brewed with local coffee!
Awesome, chill, great brews and food. Dog friendly.
Great beers with a good selection of styles.  Excellent service.  The sandwich we had was good too.  Great location and excellent vibe.  Dog friendly with big buckets of water around.
Fantastic brews, trivia night was packed! The host is hilarious and geared towards a goofy/hip crowd
We sat at the bar and TJ was phenomenal! Brat dumplings were to die for!
Immaculate vibes and great brews
Stopped by for a little bit in the afternoon with the pups. Service was amazing, beer was awesome and the fried cheese curds were simply to die for.
Great variety of beers, Good Morning Vietnam is a must try. Food was fantastic
Amazing! Did you know their beers are brewed in a way that is gluten free-friendly? Incredible! And their burgers - meaty and delicious with some of the best pickles I've ever had. Check it out!

I was and used to be a big supporter of this brewery. They had great beer, vibes and staff. I have several items of merchandise.

After last night my view and fondness for this place have been completely destroyed.

Their managers Joe and Tj are very condescending and defended their bar back who was on the clock for threatening my friend. I would suggest Keaton be fired for how he acted while on the clock at his job. Your place of business is not your own private brewey or a plave to be possive over your girl friend while you work when nobody was hitting on her.

Trust me she wasnt our type....we sat in the public area and wanted to watch duke vs unc...needless to say i will happily give my money to other local brewries who appreciate professionalism and their customers.

I am a busuness owner myself and i expect thing from my employees the same i do myself. So without hesitation.

Treating my buisness like your own and doing as you please would have that employee  gagaga gone!!!

I rekon the bar back feild can be hard to get into and find replacements for.

God Bless.
Good beer

Good beer, will go back!!
Looking forward to the kitchen to Open!!
World class brewery in a cool neighborhood!
Best beers in Charlotte!!
Super cool place. Great setup and tasty beverages! Also, a dude was cruising around in an early 90's gold Lexus jamming, "Play That Funky Music White Boy" on blast. It was amazing!
Always a good reason to go to Wooden Robot.
Great place for a local favorite.... Will at the bar is always on point best service

Fantastic beer, locally sourced ingredients that reflect seasonality. The price reflects the quality, but is always worth it. Loooovve their sour IPA. Dog friendly!!

Twisted eats has a great menu selection, but could use more vegetarian options plz! Tasty sriracha edamame
It's all about the vibe..
Lots of gluten reduced beer options for any taste
Great beer! Friendly and efficient staff
Really nice place to have a beer and watch  games, animal friendly so nice.

South end is a funny place. Go there on a random week night and you'll never find a parking spot or an open seat but, go there during a holiday week or during a home Panthers game and you've got the place to yourself. Wooden Robot is absolutely one of my favorite breweries (#2) so I have to know when to plan a visit to maximize my time there.
I love that they make a little bit of everything as far as styles go. Their patio is great for dogs and the heaters leave you feeling toasty on a cold day. The food is quick and delicious. Plenty of seating and a large bar top that's accessible from the patio. I could go on and on about this place!

P.s. try to find street parking somewhere around the block.
Good atmosphere
Fun atmosphere and great beer.
Legit beer spot. "Good Morning Vietnam" is definitely amazing. TJ is a hell of a bartender. He recommended the beers & provided great service.
This place was hoppin! Phenomenal playlist! Super cool glassware! And pretty decent beer to boot!
Great atmosphere and nice selection of beer
Best food and beer of any brewery in Charlotte by far
From IPA to Tart Brett they got it all, and the atmosphere
Good beer, super good food and very nice people.
Cheers
Really awesome atmosphere had a great time got to see this place
Great brew with killer beers. Definitely worth a visit. Great staff. Highly recommended!

We arrived at this brewery just in time to get a seat. It was full by 6pm. My husband said all of his beers on his flight were really good and my cider was good as well. We went on a Wednesday and they played a trivia game at 7.

Well taken care very quickly. Great attitude towards customer. Outstanding variety.  You ask for suggestions on what is taste worthing and they are on target. The is place makes you feel welcome. Thank you staff.
Great gameday atmosphere.  Excellent beer selection and suggestions by the staff
Great bar with a good atmosphere and large beer selection. Definitely a good stop to make on a visit to NC
What he's having was worth the trip in itself. Food was good but not to my liking (a bit sweet from the bbq sauce which is the norm down here).
Good brews, good space, good atmosphere. COVID protocols followed by almost all customers.
Great place, love the beer!!
Clea, friendly place with excellent craft beer.

They have a wide array of IPAs and each are well balanced. They are on the hazier side, which is not a bad thing. My favorite beer was Good Morning Vietnam - super tasty! Also, be sure to check out Twisted Eats - great food. The Mac and Cheese Egg roll was super tasty! (Just be sure to let it cool for a moment.) There is a small parking lot directly across the street.
Not a beer drinker.... no other options
TJ was awesome.  we had a great time.  Thanks.
Stopped in after Candlelight concert. Great beers and tasty appetizers
Great ambiance and staff! Just wish they had more options for cider.
Walk straight from the sidewalk to the taps and get a great beer. What's not to love?
Loved their new batch of Hazy IPA!
Good beer, bartender bought me a beer
Great beer, great food, great staff!
Coffee blonde was to die for! And great service and lots of outdoor seating.

Beer and atmosphere are great. They had seltzer and cider for the wife which was really nice. The 4 stars instead of 5 is because the food is pretty bad. Had Mac n cheese egg rolls, wonton nachos, and fries. The Mac n cheese egg rolls had no cheese in them. I was tempted to ask if they forgot the cheese, but then I saw a few specs holding the noodles together. C'mon you gotta have more cheese on a dish literally meant to have a lot of cheese. The fries were unfortunately bland despite looking really good. The nachos were good, but again needed more cheese and all the toppings were only on the top chips. Got half way through and it was just plain chips.
My man Joe got me covered. Super nice. Has good beer suggestions and makes us feel welcomed.
A Great place to lounge and have a beer or 3... been going here for years and notice the growth. Wooden Robot is well on its way to becoming a name in every household.
They have trivia on Tuesdays starting at 7. Had a young professional crowd and an older crowd mix. Great for everyone. Dog friendly. They serve food as well.
Good beers easy.
Love the beers and atmosphere
These folks were super nice. The beer was great! Wonderful experience at Wooden Robot.
Great selection of draft beers, especially multiple IPA choices. Dog friendly. Food not too bad. Great atmosphere and area.
Checked it out during a short visit. Loved the Good Morning Vietnam. Would have loved to try out the foods offered were I not already full.
Beer is good, nice staff, chill atmosphere
Seriously you can never go wrong with a place like this. Have a great atmosphere and a fantastic variety!

the unnecessarily rude comments from the staff almost had me in tears today. There is no need to ever comment on a customer's "face" or assume their reaction. Their comments on my private conversation were inappropriate. Will not be returning again and would not recommend.

Staff is rude and unnecessary. They spend more time commenting on private conversations than distinguishing themselves as an actual employee. Once they can start making better beer and food then they can start acting like they are worth anything. Otherwise go to your 7-Eleven and get a Miller it's the same thing.
Love this place
Good beer!
Great atmosphere! Love the option for outside seating.
Really impressed with each draft highly recommend stoping.

Dog-friendly and very nice/attentive staff. We felt very safe here as they had great COVID measures in place. The Twisted Eats stall was delicious and the beers were tasty. Definitely our new go-to place!

One of my favorite breweries in Charlotte. The Good Morning Vietnam is absolutely amazing. They have a ton of seating, inside and outside. The outside patio is covered, which makes it easily enjoyed in almost all weather.
Dan, T.J, and Nick were absolutely wonderful. Great service, always great beer, and a fun establishment to be in. Please visit!
Great place to relax, inside or on the porch. Amazing variety of beers.

Awesome brewery, a friend and I hung out here for a few hours and really enjoyed it. Cool atmosphere and killer beer. My favorite was a Russian Imperial Stout called Godless Killing Machine. Keep up the good work!
Co-working at Recess
Very nice freindly atmosphere. The beer and food were delicious. I would definitely go back.
Two words: beer cheese. Try it. These pretzel bites and beer cheese paired perfectly with our Strata Caster IPA's
Love this place! Favorite brewery that I've been to in Charlotte. Awesome environment and great vibes.

Wooden Robot has been one of my favorite places to go hang out in the past year. They're really great about making sure people are masked when not at their table. The outdoor seating is great while being covered and heated. Quality beer.
Mmmmmmm...
Always great beer and service!

Awesome place with lots of indoor and outdoor seating. Good brews and nice staff.

The indoor area is large with seating spread out enough. The outdoor seating has a covered patio with lots of tables, heaters and TVs. Good for all seasons.

Great job across all areas.
Always have great new beers on tap!
Food was well seasoned. Unique menu compared to other brewery locations. High top tables. Nice outside space. Dog friendly.
Very polite and very kind, we installed gas water heater

Best staff and beer in Charlotte. Throughout the pandemic they have taken extreme care to keep their guests and staff safe and their space clean and friendly. I've never met a Wooden Robot beer I didn't like, and the service is unmatched. Give them a visit, wear your mask, and tip your beertender! They deserve it.

Was at the bar for about 1.5 hours and enjoyed it until
It was time to leave. Went to close out my tab and grab a crowler. It was crowded so I waited for about 10 minutes(which I didn't mind) Got to the bar and the manager came over to help. He was extremely aggressive when asking what I needed. I asked for my bill and to get a crowler. He yelled that they don't do crowlers inside and to go outside even though I'd been waiting. I went outside to stand at the window and he came back yelling again that I was at the wrong window. I finally got someone besides him and they were pleasant to deal with.

Great beer but whomever the manager is(shaved or short hair and beard) has some anger issues and should just stay away from customers and let the staff handle things.
One of the best breweries in Charlotte.
Delicious beer. Fun atmosphere.
Great service, good beer, dog friendly.
Super dog friendly, great beer, delicious food! The peach cobbler and blackberry sours are tart (in the best way) and good morning vietnam is always a solid go-to. Very chill atmosphere.
Nice selection of home brews at very reasonable prices...food was decent too.
Great beer and vibes in a nice building and outdoor space.
Great beer and a fantastic staff! Absolutely recommend this brewery if you're in the area. The Pretty Witty and Good Morning Vietnam are fantastic beers.
The beer is a 10/10 the music is a 10/10 the atmosphere is 10/10 no doubt best beer in charolette
Great service, great atmosphere, great food, and especially great beer.  I definitely recommend
Clean, fresh, great staff. Thank you
Best beer, service, atmosphere... the best
Best beers in Charlotte. Great atmosphere and and bartenders.
